Detailed Description

Main interface class

Standard interface with ENCARA2 detector

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CENCARA2_2Detector::CENCARA2_2Detector ( char *  DataDir,
int  sx,
int  sy,
char *  cfgFile = NULL 
) [inline]

Class constructor.

The constructor must specify the dimensions of the images where will be later analyzed. However, the dimensions can be modified adter initialization by means of SetWorkingSize()

Parameters:
DataDir Containes the location of the data folder
sx Width of the images to process
sy Height of the images to process
cfgFile If not null, describes the location, relative to DataDir, of the config file

CENCARA2_2Detector::~CENCARA2_2Detector (  )  [inline]

Class destructor.

Releases the structures allocated.

Member Function Documentation

void CENCARA2_2Detector::ResetsDebugFile (  )  [inline]

Resets debug file.

Debug file size is set to zero.

void CENCARA2_2Detector::SetWorkingSize ( int  sx,
int  sy 
) [inline]

Creates working images according to size provided. It allows the modification of the processing size without invoking again the constructor.

Parameters:
sx Width of the images to process
sy Height of the images to process

void CENCARA2_2Detector::DetectorReset (  )  [inline]

Resets the detector history.

Resets the detector history. The next frame processed will be considered the first one, i.e. the system memory will be empty until a new detection is achieved.

void CENCARA2_2Detector::DetectorLostReset (  )  [inline]

Frees information related to lost detection threads.

Frees information related to lost detection threads

void CENCARA2_2Detector::ForceDetection ( int  iface,
int  oix,
int  oiy,
int  odx,
int  ody 
) [inline]

Provides external detection data for a selected face among actives.

For situations in which eye detection has been done by an external tool

Parameters:
iface Face to correct
oix x coordinate of left eye
oiy y coordinate of left eye
odx x coordinate of right eye
ody y coordinate of right eye

minsize Minimum size accepted for a region

CFacialDataperImage* CENCARA2_2Detector::GetFacialData (  )  [inline]

Returns pointer to the list of active detection threads.

Allows the access to face detection information

CFacialDataperImage* CENCARA2_2Detector::GetFacialDataLost (  )  [inline]

Returns pointer to the list of lost detection threads.

Allows the access to face detection information of already lost detection threads

void CENCARA2_2Detector::ApplyENCARA2 ( IplImage *  h,
int  scale = 2 
)

Standard interface to detect faces using ENCARA2

Parameters:
h Image where the search will be performed
scale 1 uses the input image scale, 2 halves it.

void CENCARA2_2Detector::ApplyViolaBasedDetector ( IplImage *  h,
int  iDetector,
int **  px1,
int **  py1,
int **  px2,
int **  py2,
int  scale = 2 
)

Standard interface to detect faces in an image.

Parameters:
h Image where the search will be performed
iDetector Identifies the detector to apply (OPENCV_FACE, OWN_LEYE, OWN_REYE, OWN_BOTHEYES, OWN_NOSE, OWN_MOUTH, OWN_HS)
px1 Array of left upper corner x coodinates returned
py1 Array of left upper corner y coodinates returned
px2 Array of bottom right upper corner x coodinates returned
py2 Array of bottom right upper corner y coodinates returned
scale 1 uses the input image scale, 2 halves it

Parameters:
h Image to plot the results
